title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 70.1 - Change in beer prices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 70.1 - Change in beer prices

State Regulations

No brewer or beer wholesaler may increase the price per
case, draft package or special package of beer sold to beer wholesalers or
retail licensees until at least 180 days have elapsed since his last price
decrease on such case, draft package or special package, provided, however, that the brewer or beer wholesaler may increase any price established by him at
any time in the amount of any direct tax increase on beer, or on containers
thereof, actually paid by such brewer or beer wholesaler. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
70.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
